articles.author: Kate Beioley
articles.title: Allen & Overy and Shearman plan merger to create $3.4bn law firm - Financial Times
articles.description: Deal is first tie-up between a ‘magic circle’ group and an American rival in more than 20 years
articles.content: Magic circle law firm Allen & Overy is merging with New Yorks Shearman & Sterling to form a practice with combined revenues of about $3.4bn, in one of the biggest transatlantic legal tie-ups … [+3807 chars]

articles.author: Sam Lyman
articles.title: Ripple Effects From SEC Suit Could Strengthen Coinbase Litigation - Forbes
articles.description: In the SEC v. Ripple case, the Hinman documents could vindicate Ripple and XRP, in addition to boosting Coinbase's own litigation.
articles.content: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse has said the Hinman emails related to the SEC lawsuit will "shock" the ... [+] public once they are released. These same documents could strengthen Coinbase's own legal c… [+5108 chars]
